channel.title: Tops on What's hurting today?
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on What's hurting today?

item.description: I’m William Honaker, and welcome to this small collection of writings about my various chronic aches and pains. Nearly every day of my life since I was about 18 years old, I’ve dealt with low back pain. The discomfort has taken me on a wild ride of painful experiences, from excruciating spasms confining me to the floor and painful aches making long drives into hellish ordeals, to the anxiety that every less-painful day is only the calm before the next big flareup.
KNEE PAIN Do you have knee pain?
LOW BACK PAIN A series on low back pain.
Series Links to series about useful topics here. Knee Pain Low Back Pain
